column3: just decent.  I didn't care for the foie gras scallops
column4: which was the only thing that I insisted on.  However
column5: I'd have to say that they had some kind of taco appetizer that was really good
column6: and their grilled squid was really nice.  But neither of those were sushi.  I felt the sashimi pieces seemed smaller than I'd desired.  Everything was good
column7: just not great.  I guess that's what happens when you have high expectations for a place.
